00032 #ifndef U300_RIL_SIM_H
00033 #define U300_RIL_SIM_H 1
00034 
00035 /* The SIM's EF File Header size is variable, but 
00036  * there's no harm in asking for more bytes than 
00037  * are available. The SIM will never reply with 
00038  * more than the header size. So the value below 
00039  * is designed to ensure we always get the maximum
00040  * number of bytes for the header for proper parsing
00041  */
00042 #define SIM_HEADER_REQ_SIZE 64
00043 
00044 /* The command used to ask the SIM to provide its 
00045  * file header
00046  */
00047 #define SIM_GET_RESPONSE 0xC0
00048 
00049 void onSimStateChanged(const char *s);
00050 
00051 void requestGetSimStatus(void *data, size_t datalen, RIL_Token t);
00052 void requestSIM_IO(void *data, size_t datalen, RIL_Token t);
00053 void requestEnterSimPin(void *data, size_t datalen, RIL_Token t, int request);
00054 void requestChangePassword(void *data, size_t datalen, RIL_Token t,
00055                            char *facility);
00056 void requestSetFacilityLock(void *data, size_t datalen, RIL_Token t);
00057 void requestQueryFacilityLock(void *data, size_t datalen, RIL_Token t);
00058 
00059 void pollSIMState(void *param);
00060 
00061 
00062 /* Prototypes for functions that have different implementations for QMI and AT
00063  * RILs, but are used by common code in swicommon/swiril_sim.c
00064  */
00065 bool useDelayedSIMReady(void);
00066 int getPINRetryCountQMI(void);
